column4: thegatekeeper:  there was an artical on slashdot a week ago I think.
but rather stay away from xgl, if you really want to persuade your boss :-)
all:  does any one know the easy way of upgrading to the newest stable version of Ubuntu with out needing a CD and still being in Ubuntu?
it keeps the riff raff away from my laptop.  They're afraid they'll break it.
